[/code] if this is right can you tell me what to put in it? or give me the right code? thanks... [hr] [font=comic sans ms][size=1]go to [url=http://www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/]www.freewebs.com/elloolechap/[/url] and join in on spyro's isle v2.5! ~a good, stable sever~[/size][/font]

item.title: Need help with putting a sever client on my website
item.dc:creator: @rune_unlimited rune unlimited
item.description:
@rune_unlimited wrote:

well yes thats one way, but it’s to time consuming… freewebs makes more simple and less time consuming… with making it with HTML you go to note pad and you already have to have your html codes made and a bunch of other crap… freewebs does that all for you…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 04:58:19 PM[/size][hr]oh and plus I"m not putting the client on another freewebs page I’m making my own page with HTML with the client on it and uploading it to freewebs and putting a link to it on my site… so if its so unstable then that page probably wont mess up and i don’t want to buy a domain…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2007, 05:13:20 PM[/size][hr]thnaks for helping “onlyme” but that does not work…it still says “loading java aplet faild…” and i don’t really know what im doing so i’de really appraicate it if someone would help out…
